General.Name: Focus Lumber Bhd
General.Description: Focus Lumber Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of plywood, veneer, and laminated veneer lumber products. The company operates through two segments, Manufacturing and Electricity. Its products are used in recreational vehicle, home decorating, house construction, and furniture industries. The company is also involved in the generation and sale of electricity through biomass; and investment in monetary instruments. It operates in Malaysia, Australia, Canada, Hong Kong, Korea, Japan, Taiwan, and the Unites States. The company was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Keningau, Malaysia.
